name: Warface - Deluxe Starter Pack
detailed_description:
The “Deluxe” edition contains the following items:

  • Jungle weapons for all classes: ZX84K, Striker, MM28, SVK;
  • Winter weapons for all classes: A3 9mm XS, MC 255 12, AC7 SNR, M95 AR;
  • 90-day VIP bonus (100% XP Reward Boost, 50% Arsenal Unlock Boost, 75% Money Reward Boost);
  • All Guerilla body skins;
  • All Arctic Squad body skins;
  • M9A1 Winter camo;
  • Sapper shovel Winter camo;
  • 5000 Kredits.

If you purchase this pack, you get 270% more item value than you would buying the items separately.

The “Deluxe” edition is just the option for the hard-edged warriors accustomed to have it all. A royal offering: all armor skins, both Jungle and Winter weapons, M9A1 Winter camo, Sapper shovel winter camo, 5000 Kredits and a 90-day VIP bonus - with all this you can deliver relentless justice and gain the most abundant benefits.

MORE ABOUT THE WEAPONS:


Assault rifle - ZX84K. ZX84K is a powerful assault rifle with one of the highest aimed accuracy values in the game. The Jungle model has improved specifications. Outfit the weapon to suit your playstyle with a variety of barrel extensions, scopes and rail modifications available.

Shotgun – Striker. Striker is a prominent shotgun famous for its outstanding rate of fire and a large 12-gauge cartridge. The Jungle model has improved specifications. Outfit the weapon to suit your playstyle with a variety of barrel extensions and scopes modifications available.

SMG – MM28. MM28 is a submachine gun chosen for its impressive rate of fire and quick reload. This may influence the spread though, that is why it is mostly used in close quarters. The Jungle model has slightly improved accuracy. Outfit the weapon to suit your playstyle with a variety of barrel extensions and scopes modifications available.

Sniper rifle – SVK. SVK is one of the most renowned sniper weapons in the world, a must-have for every aspiring marksman. The Jungle model has vastly improved damage and makes this classic rifle even more reliable. Outfit the weapon to suit your playstyle with a variety of barrel extensions, scopes and rail modifications available. Looking for challenges? Unlock custom achievements with this weapon!

Assault rifle – M95 AR. M95 AR is an assault rifle noted for its high fire rate and the largest cartridge of all assault rifles available, as well as a large number of modifications. The Winter model has improved specifications. Outfit the weapon to suit your playstyle with a variety of barrel extensions, scopes and rail modifications available.

Shotgun – MC 255 12. MC 255 12 is a reliable shotgun mostly loved for its high damage and good hip accuracy. Yet the Winter model improves its specifications strongly enough to make MC 255 12 a weapon of choice for medics in Warface. Outfit the weapon to suit your playstyle with a variety of barrel extensions and scopes modifications available.

SMG – A3 9mm XS. A3 9mm XS is a well-balanced SMG due to its combination of perfect hip/aimed accuracy and high rate of fire. The Winter model has increased damage and range. Outfit the weapon to suit your playstyle with a variety of barrel extensions, scopes and rail modifications available.

Sniper rifle – AC7 SNR. AC7 SNR is suited for all snipers willing to eliminate their enemy swiftly and efficiently: it has the highest rate of fire of all sniper rifles in the game. The Winter model has improved damage and reduced recoil. Outfit the weapon to suit your playstyle with a variety of barrel extensions, scopes and rail modifications available.

Pistol - M9A1. M9A1 is suited to any playstyle due to its overall decent specifications, such as high damage large cartridge and impressive accuracy. The Winter model improves the rate of fire even further. Outfit the pistol with either a suppressor, flash guard or even a bayonet!

Melee – Sapper shovel. When it comes to melee, the sapper shovel outmatches the knife due to its greater reach. The Winter model can help you kill your enemies with style!

supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2 GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or AMD ATI Radeon 3650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.6 GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT or better, AMD Radeon 3870 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
